RainbruRPG::Exception

RainbruRPG::Exception Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

The namespace of the logger and the exceptions.

This namespace contains the Logger,the exceptions or the debugging classes. The attributes wrapper used by the debugging console to access game values are in this namespace.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum RainbruRPG::Exception::tLogLevel

Choose the logs that must be logged.

The level of each log will be tested with the value of logLevel. if les log's level is greater or equal than logLevel, we log it. If the log's level is less than logLevel, we don't print it.

See also:
Logger::setLogLevel
Enumerator:
LL_INFO  The information log level.
LL_WARN  The warning log level.
LL_ERR  The error log level.

Definition at line 115 of file logger.h.

enum RainbruRPG::Exception::tLogOutType

The type of the logger's out.

This enumeration defines the out style of the logger. You can choose to send log messages to STDOUT, to a file or both.

See also:
Logger::setLogType, Logger::setFilename
Enumerator:
LOG_STDOUT  Log out on the stdout c++ stream.
LOG_FILE  Log in a text file.
LOG_BOTH  Log on the stdout and a textfile.
